)
Module

Defined in /Users/rbrunschwiler/Documents/github/terrificjs/dist/terrific.js:254

Registers a module.

Parameters:

  • ctx Node

    The context node

  • mod String

    The module name. It must match the class name of the module

  • skins Array

    A list of skin names. Each entry must match a class name of a skin

  • namespace String

    The module namespace

Returns:

Module:

The reference to the registered module
